preSteps.title: You haven't verified your identity (KYC) in MapleStory N
preSteps.description:
To play MapleStory N, there are 2 options:
1. Hold 10 NXPC (~ $10) just to enter the game – and you cannot spend that.
2. A cheaper solution: We’ll verify KYC for you via a link.

steps.title: Step 1: Select avatar and click Verification
Step 3.1: Scan the QR code
steps.description: After scanning, you'll see a KYC link like https://form.argosidentity.com/?pid=... Copy and paste it into our KYC form.

steps.title: Step 3.2: Or upload the QR image
steps.description: If you can’t scan, upload the image instead. The system will auto-extract the link. Crop the image for best accuracy.

steps.title: Step 4: We will complete the KYC process for you
Step 5: When completed, you’ll reach level 1 verification

warning.title: ⚠️ Scam Alert:
warning.text: Beware of fake groups, individuals, or 'newbie guides' that say 'you can play without KYC' — it's likely a scam! Metamask wallets can’t regenerate the same 12 words, the private key is unique. If leaked, your funds are gone. Only do KYC from trusted sources!
